Like with Nioh 2, will try to keep everything in one place for FFVII-Remake...
i will only mention & credit the author as b4 without appending the discord tag as most of these codes are from discord anyway...

########## RESOURCES & CODES START HERE ##########
USE THESE CODES AT YOUR OWN RISK!, I am not responsible if any of these codes break your save, as a good practice I always make a backup of my save beforehand every time I apply a cheat.
 
########## DISCLAIMER ##########
The work put into the creation & maintainment of these codes & resources come from some of the following Discord Servers: 
Discord Server List: https://github.com/sterben-Dev10/SaveWizard-Resources
The Author's listed above codes & the Creators & Maintainers

-- I will keep this updated as long as I can, as updates made to the game do sometimes break codes & they do get updated 

FFVII-Remake Experimental Codes-Notes [SaveWizard]: https://github.com/sterben-Dev10/SaveWizard-Resources/blob/main/SaveWizard-Codes/FFVII-Remake%20Experimental%20Codes-Notes%20%5BSaveWizard%5D.txt
http://web.save-editor.com/bbs/index_saveeditor.html <-- The JP Site where other codes come from (well i think) [use chrome to auto-translate]

Mods Thread Discussion: http://web.save-editor.com/bbs/patchcode/ps4/bbs.cgi?list=pickup&num=26460# (Codes Here)
Q/A Chat: http://web.save-editor.com/bbs/patchcode/ps4/bbs.cgi?list=pickup&num=26461# (Codes Here)

Mores Codes (JP): https://ameblo.jp/cool-shadow-moon/entry-12590539399.html

# khuong (testbot) #
Auto-generated codes by Khuong (uses Jimmy's Template, auto-fills with spreadsheet IDs).  Updated every 6 hours with IDs from spreadsheet.
https://khuong.ca/sges/ff7r/qcs.php (many codes here)

khuong's (testbot) Generated GC's Mirror
Part A: https://github.com/sterben-Dev10/SaveWizard-Resources/blob/main/SaveWizard-Codes/FFVII%20-%20khuong%20QC%20Part%20A%20%5BSaveWizard%5D.txt (07.05.2020) <-- Last Updated [GMT+10]
Part B: https://github.com/sterben-Dev10/SaveWizard-Resources/blob/main/SaveWizard-Codes/FFVII%20-%20khuong%20QC%20Part%20B%20%5BSaveWizard%5D.txt (07.05.2020) <-- Last Updated [GMT+10]
Notes: while most of these codes are the same, they do get updated the offsets change i've noticed... 
try comparing the codes with the ones on NGU or Hackinformer you will notice its not 100% a 1 FOR 1 Copy.

Xeeynamo's Save Editor: https://github.com/Xeeynamo/KH3SaveEditor/releases (Technically its a KH editor but support for FFVII is being added)
El'Capitano FFVII Save Editor: https://mega.nz/file/u1JSSQoI#Lyo5g5Cj_28_t4LPp14b4743gypHVVL30L9HQjd-YdE | Mirror: https://mega.nz/file/UkNwQQgQ#wGLLV6IOaNJuayOvplzaRCKLImHF2nElPx6d6jdogmQ

FFVII Save Set Downloads (Trophies etc..) Refer To: https://github.com/sterben-Dev10/SaveWizard-Resources/blob/main/SaveWizard-Codes/FFVII-Remake%20Notes-IDs%20%5BSaveWizard%5D.txt (FFVII-Remake Notes-IDs [SaveWizard])

Unlock All Weapon Abilities
400345E6 0000000A
40170002 00000000

Enemy Intel/Assessed.
42042FBC FFFFFFFF
43DC0008 00000000

Enemy Killed.
40042FC0 000000XX
43DC0008 00000000

XX AMOUNT KILLED.

BATTLE REPORT - nonameX
Burst phenomenon analysis
00034634 0000000A

# Skiller #
### Start ###
Dress Mod - Based on "Luseu" Work for the Editor 
0004288A 000000XX - Cloud
XX = 
04 = Black Dress
08 = Blue
10 = White

0004288B 000000XX - Tifa

XX = 
10 = Blue Dress
20 = Dress 
40 = Japan Dress

1004288C 0000XXXX - Aerith

XX = 
0040 = Pink 1
0050 = Pink 2
0100 = Red Dress
### END ##

Max Stats
Note: This will Reset at some point resave and use again. 
If you start a chapter and it fail save again after cuts and stuff and do again, 
Normally goes away after someone Joins you or leaves 

### Start ###
Cloud
95000000 00000030
08000000 00000000
08000001 00000000
08000002 00000004
08000003 000000FF
4A000010 0000270F
40040004 00000000
28000020 3B9AC9FF
4A000028 009892FA
40050004 00000000

95000000 00000070
08000000 00000000
08000001 00000000
08000002 00000004
08000003 000000FF
4A000010 0000270F
40040004 00000000

4A000028 009892FA
40050004 00000000

Refill HP and MP
95000000 00000030

Party Setting (Skiller via xeeynamo offsets)
A07CD36C 00000005
XXYYZZKK LL000000

XX - Cloud
YY - Barret
ZZ - Tifa
KK - Spoiler (ree)
LL - Future Spoiler (REE)

00 - Undiscovered
01 - In Party
02 - Out of Party

Party Setting V2?
### Start ###
Current Save. Character MOD
80010010 4C4F5344
4C4F5344 4C4F5344
4C4F5344 00000000
93000000 00000010
88010004 XXXXXXXX
A8000028 00000005
CCBBTTAA XX000000

Repalce CC/BB/TT/AA/XX
00 = Undiscovered
01 = In Party
02 = Out of Party

Current Save. - Controlled Character
80010010 4C4F5344
4C4F5344 4C4F5344
4C4F5344 00000000
93000000 00000010
88010004 XXXXXXXX
08000027 000000NN

Replace NN With 
00 = Cloud 
01 = Barret
02 = Tifa
03 = Aries 
04 = Rexxy 

Replace XXXXXXXX With 
20610B00 = 00
30C21100 = 01
40231800 = 02
50841E00 = 03
60E52400 = 04
70462B00 = 05
80A73100 = 06
A0693E00 = 07
B0CA4400 = 08
C02B4B00 = 09
F04E5E00 = 10
10116B00 = 11
20727100 = 12
A0693E00 = 13
### END ###

# Jimmy The Burger Wizard #

Mod Item Amount (Template)
95000000 00034DD0
88010008 00000000
XXXXXXXX 00000000
28000008 0000ZZZZ

XXXXXXXX = Item ID (Use A. Mode from spreadsheet)
ZZZZ = Item Amount

Mod Item Amount alt (could be older ver)
95000000 00034DD0
88010008 00000000
XXXXXXXX 00000000
28000008 0000270F

XXXXXXX=Item ID (Please reverse ID, ex 00000001> 01000000)
Refer to the google doc for ids..

Add Item
95000000 00034DD0
8801000C 00000000
00000000 FFFFFFFF
A8000000 00000014
YYYYYYYY 00000000
XXXXXXXX ZZZZ0000
AA000000 00000000

YYYYYYYY = hash (UNIX Epoch Timestamp)
XXXXXXXX = Item ID (Use A. Mode from spreadsheet)
ZZZZ = Item Amount
AA = Item Category

00000000 FFFFFFFF
A8000000 00000014
B3A6975E 00000000
64230000 0A000000
09000000 00000000

Change Gotterdammerung Amount to 10 (If you already got 1)
95000000 00034DD0
88010004 64230000
28000004 0000000A

95000000 00034DD0

00000000 FFFFFFFF

B3A6975E 00000000

08000000 00000000
95000000 00034DD0
8801000C 00000000
00000000 FFFFFFFF
A8000000 00000014
B3A6975E 00000000
33230000 05000000
08000000 00000000
95000000 00034DD0
8801000C 00000000
00000000 FFFFFFFF
A8000000 00000014
B3A6975E 00000000
38230000 05000000
08000000 00000000
Notes:
1. Physical Defense +50, Magic Defense +50, 4 slots
2. Physical Defense +124, Magic Defense +20, 0 slot
3. Physical Defense +20, Magic Defense +124, 0 slot
Gives x3 of Chain Bangle, Astral Cuff and Iron Maiden

42001744 FFFFFFFF
40080020 00000000
42001748 FFFFFFFF
40080020 00000000
Notes:
Does not add starting weapons, so if you've somehow lost those, you're on your own. 
For best results, use at the start of the game only.

10x Each Materia: https://github.com/sterben-Dev10/SaveWizard-Resources/blob/main/SaveWizard-Codes/FFVII-Remake%20Materia%20List.txt

Add Materia
95000000 00001840
88010014 00090000
00000000 00000000
00000000 00000000
A8000000 00000014
GGHHIIJJ XXXXXXXX
YYYYYYYY 00000000
ZZZZZZZZ 00000000
93000000 00000008
58000000 00000004
58000020 00000000
3A000020 00000001

Materia arrays are 0x20 long:
0x00: GG = Level
0x01: HH = Equipped on:
    00    : Cloud
    01    : Barret
    02    : Tifa
    03    : Spoiler (ree)
    04-08 : Future spoilers
    09    : No one
0x02: II = NFC (01 for safety)
0x03: JJ = NFC (00 for safety)
0x04: XXXXXXXX = ID
0x08: YYYYYYYY = AP
0x10: ZZZZZZZZ = Time Stamp (Epoch Unix)
0x18: KK = Order found, automatically set by copying the previous entry and increment by 1

Add XXXXXXXX of each of Cloud's books
95000000 00034DD0
8801000C 00000000
00000000 FFFFFFFF
4A000000 5E970000
400E0018 00000050
4A000008 0000013C
400E0018 00000001
4A00000C XXXXXXXX
400E0018 00000000
4A000010 00000002
400E0018 00000000

XXXXXXXX of Barret's books
95000000 00034DD0
8801000C 00000000
00000000 FFFFFFFF
4A000000 5E971000
400E0018 00000050
4A000008 0000014B
400E0018 00000001
4A00000C XXXXXXXX
400E0018 00000000
4A000010 00000002
400E0018 00000000

XXXXXXXX of Tifa's Books
95000000 00034DD0
8801000C 00000000
00000000 FFFFFFFF
4A000000 5E972000
400E0018 00000050
4A000008 0000015A
400E0018 00000001
4A00000C XXXXXXXX
400E0018 00000000
4A000010 00000002
400E0018 00000000

change XXXX to the id starting point
u want to check

# nonameX #

Add carbuncle
95000000 00001840
80010014 00090000
00000000 00000000
00000000 00000000
A8000000 00000020
01090100 B7360000
000F423F 00000000
C165985E 00000000
01000000 00000000

Panacea
95000000 00034DD0
8801000C 00000000
00000000 FFFFFFFF
A8000000 00000014
C165985E 00000000
0B000000 62000000
00000000 00000000

Gogo Magic Light Card Key
95000000 00034DD0
8801000C 00000000
00000000 FFFFFFFF
A8000000 00000014
C165985E 00000000
64000000 10000000
00000000 00000000

Gogo Magic Light Card Key V2 (Alt, JP Forum)
95000000 00034DD0
8801000C 00000000
00000000 FFFFFFFF
A8000000 00000014
C165985E 00000000
64000000 XX000000
AA000000 00000000

XX = Number
AA = Category 00 Item 02 Key item
Notes (Google Translation):
if you picked one key item, it would be easier to directly rewrite it in AD mode.
The above code is a code to add a new item instead of increasing the possessed items, so it may be better to use it without picking it up.
If you use it while you have it, there are two same items in the item column.

28000000 FF040000
4A000010 0000270F
40040004 00000000

40050004 00000000

# Other Notes, AM #
FFVII-Remake Notes-IDs: https://github.com/sterben-Dev10/SaveWizard-Resources/blob/main/SaveWizard-Codes/FFVII-Remake%20Notes-IDs%20%5BSaveWizard%5D.txt

https://khuong.ca/sges/ff7r/test.php - a breakdown of locations within save

Google Doc (Item IDs and Categories): https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1njF36gS_i723WuQiDkM4A_M64kJNDxbZiuXdr7xX86E - # Skiller #
Google Doc (From Demo of the game): https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1JSKbzyMFxLkMEsxMC31B_ZQhesOfFs9Bo2HfxnFSaLw
Unix Hex Timestamp Converter: https://www.epochconverter.com/hex | https://www.unixtimestamp.com/index.php - needed for something..

# Silent Knight #
FFVII-Remake Materia List: https://github.com/sterben-Dev10/SaveWizard-Resources/blob/main/SaveWizard-Codes/FFVII-Remake%20Materia%20List.txt

# Code Wizard #
items starting point 
00034DD0

0x00 = hash 
0x04 = NFC
0x08 = ID
0x0C = Amount 
0x10 = Item Type 
0x14 = NFC
rinse repeat

each section is about 0x810 in size
also items seem to stay in the inventory even when at 0

# Skiller #
01 09 01 00 14270000 11000000 00000000 A51E875E 00000000 01000000 00000000

0x00 [\x08] = ?
0x01 [\x08] = Equiped/Not?
0x02 [\x08] = ?
0x03 [\x08] = ?
0x04 [\x32] = Materia ID
0x08 [\x32] = AP
0x0C [\x32] = ?
0x10 [\x32] = Unix Time
0x14 [\x32] = ?
0x18 [\x32] = Slot Count
0x1C [\x32] = ?
